name: @tuprolog/parser-utils
description: Parsing utilis for Prolog in JS environments

scripts.compile-grammar: curl https://www.antlr.org/download/antlr-4.11.0-complete.jar --output antlr.jar && java -jar antlr.jar -visitor -o src-gen -Dlanguage=JavaScript antlr/PrologLexer.g4 && java -jar antlr.jar -visitor -lib src-gen/antlr -o src-gen -Dlanguage=JavaScript antlr/PrologParser.g4 && mv src-gen/antlr/* src-gen/ && rmdir src-gen/antlr
scripts.test: node test/TestImport.js && node test/TestLexer.js && node test/TestParser.js

author: tuProlog
